title: Business Development Representative - US (m/f/d)
content:
Allow us to introduce ourselves
Hello there! We‚Äôre Appinio, the fastest (and coolest) market research platform. On a mission to make the world a little more fact-based, we help companies understand how consumers think and make better data-driven decisions.
We started out in Hamburg back in 2014 but we‚Äôre now humbled to call the world our playground, with over 200 employees spread across 25 cities (we‚Äôre remote-first), 2000+ international clients and a panel reach of 7 million, globally.
Want to be a part of the Appinio movement? üöÄ

Your mission as a Business Development Representative - US
As we enter the US market, we're seeking creative, motivated individuals to support our growth efforts. Business Development Representative role offers a unique opportunity to drive and execute Appinio's US GTM, Sales, and Marketing efforts, contributing to our US expansion and success.
In this role, you'll play a pivotal part in shaping Appinio's US strategy and growth. Join us to be a core component of our expansion and help us thrive in this exciting phase of our journey.
What you‚Äôll be doing:

Identify, develop, and implement new client verticals and growth opportunities to generate a consistent client pipeline.
Identify new business opportunities and build + cultivate relationships with partners, advisors, and the Tech and Market Research/Consumer Intelligence ecosystem.
Cultivate relationships and represent Appinio to senior decision-makers at multinational companies to generate sales opportunities.
Leverage email, phone, social media, and in-person events to meet new clients and present our solution's benefits.
Identify growth obstacles and leverage internal resources and external networks for solutions.
Represent Appinio at Trade Fairs, Public Speaking events, expand your network, and leverage existing contacts to drive our business.
Partner closely with our US GM, one of Appinio‚Äôs founders, and the EU Chief of Staff to launch Appinio in the US

Simply put: You are expected to develop a client roster, identify your core contacts, and work creatively by leveraging existing and new relationships to help transform Appinio from a European market research leader into the market leader and clear winner in North America.
You will thrive in this role if:
We consider applicants with a variety of backgrounds. We care less about your background and more about your as a person. Things we look out for: 

You are empathetic, energetic, passionate, and assertive hunter who possesses a strong mentality for ownership and success
You have an eye for detail with excellent written and verbal communication skills
You have a hands-on attitude and thrive in a fast-paced environment, not shying away from juggling multiple projects at once
You are a result-oriented person that loves to sell and doesn‚Äôt take ‚Äúno‚Äù for an answer
You have strong organization and time-management skills as you‚Äôll be working with hundreds of prospects simultaneously
You are excellent at building collaborative relationships at all levels within an organization
You are motivated to pursue a career in sales
Bonus: You have prior experience with Hubspot, Salesforce, Outreach, and other prospecting tools and exposure to the market research industry

What‚Äôs in it for you?

Remote-first hiring, enabling you to join a fantastic US team from anywhere in North America.
Enjoy European Vacation Days plus flexible time off‚Äî20 vacation days and no maximum limit on paid time off with our Flexibility Policy. Additionally, receive 30 days of paid time off per year for medical reasons.
Access healthcare coverage, with Appinio currently covering 50% of employees' and their dependents' costs. You can join a group plan or our QSEHRA, depending on your location.
Benefit from a 401(k) plan with an employer match of at least 50%.
Appinio offers discretionary equity shares to our team members.





This post not only outlines our ideal candidate but also serves as an inspiration for what this role can evolve into. Even if you consider yourself an 80% fit but have a genuine passion for this position, we encourage you to apply. We're eager to hear from individuals who share our enthusiasm.
Appinio is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.
